document_data.name: Iyrindyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Iyrindyl''' was a [[Shar]]ran faithful during the mid-8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was a bald man with purple and black robes.{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|692|16}} Also, he was the youngest of his peers.
document_data.Abilities: As a dreadspells, he wielded borrowed arcane power.
document_data.History: While the Sharran woodsman [[Uldus Blackram]] was leading the Sharran dreadspells to ruins within [[the Dead Place]] during the Chaos of [[the Art]] of the {{yearlinkName|767}}, with a noose tied to his throat, they came across a hostile elven mage, [[Ilbryn Starym]]. Iyrindyl was struck down by a tree that fell due to the wild magic raised during the ensuing spell-battle; [[Femter Deldrannus]], a fellow Dreadspell, confirmed he was dead after the fight.
